archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Report on Work Order
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: The Report on Work Order process manages status and notifications and executes various reports about work orders.

properties.value: The Report on Work Order scope includes the following: â€¢{T}Executing reports on work orders, work items, and tasks being performed â€¢{T}Monitoring the status of work orders and managing notifications to processes and other parties registered to receive notifications of any status changes â€¢{T}Executing performance reports for various workforces
